description: Angular component defining an 'Empty State' UI element with configurable title and subtitle, used to inform users when no data (recipes) are available.

classes.name: EmptyStateComponent
classes.description: An Angular component displaying a friendly message with an emoji and text, indicating the absence of data such as recipes.

methods.name: title
methods.description: Input property for the main message title, defaulting to 'No recipes found'.

methods.name: subtitle
methods.description: Input property for the supplementary message, defaulting to 'Try a different search or adjust your filters.'.

ctags.name: subtitle
ctags.pattern: /^  @Input() subtitle = 'Try a different search or adjust your filters.';$/

fields.name: @Input() subtitle = 'Try a different search or adjust your filters.';
